verses.name: 1 John 5:15
verses.text: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.

verses.name: 1 John 5:16
verses.text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.

verses.name: 1 John 5:17
verses.text: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.
